CONDITION_X.description_1_s: <span class="translated">When the upper limit is received
CONDITION_X.description_1_e: will be switched on for the set time.
CONDITION_X.description_2_s: <span class="translated">When the lower limit is received
CONDITION_X.description_2_e: will be switched on for the set time.
CONDITION_X.description_3_s: <span class="translated">When the upper or lower limit is received
CONDITION_X.description_3_e: will be switched on for the set time.
CONDITION_X.description_4_s: <span class="translated">When the upper limit is received
CONDITION_X.description_4_e: will be switched on for the set time and off when the lower limit is received.
CONDITION_X.descrHint: You can define a time for sending a switching command via the switch actuator at the corresponding channel.
CONDITION_X.descrHintMS: To activate the profile, please define for the corresponding channel of the switch actuator that a switching command will be send if the selected value will be exceeded or falls below the threshold.

KEY.description_1_s: <span class="translated">With a long or short button press
KEY.description_1_e: will be switched on for the set time.
KEY.description_2_s: <span class="translated">With a long or short button press
KEY.description_2_e: will be switched on or off (toggle function).
KEY.description_3_s: <span class="translated">With a long or short button press

MOTION_DETECTOR.description_1_e: will be switched on for the set time.
MOTION_DETECTOR.hint0a: Attention! The selected switch-on time of the actuator is shorter than the minimum transmission interval of
MOTION_DETECTOR.hint0b: s. Please select a value that is longer than this interval.
MOTION_DETECTOR.hint1a: As the next movement will be send in
MOTION_DETECTOR.hint1b: s, the actuator will otherwise switch off before and only switch on after the minimum transmission interval has expired.
MOTION_DETECTOR.hint_ontime_0: Attention! A switch-on time >2 min is not allowed for alarm sirens!
MOTION_DETECTOR.hint_ontime_1: In connection with an alarm siren the mode must be set to "absolut" mode as the switch-on time in mode "minimal" is not exactly defined.

ROTARY_HANDLE_SENSOR.description_0a_s: When the window is opened the
ROTARY_HANDLE_SENSOR.description_0a_e: will be switched on for the entire time.
ROTARY_HANDLE_SENSOR.description_1a_e: will be switched on for the selected time.
ROTARY_HANDLE_SENSOR.description_2a_s: <span class="translated">If the selected change signal is recognized the

SENSOR_WINDOW.description_0a_e: will be switched on for the selected time.
SENSOR_WINDOW.description_1a_e: will be switched on for the selected time.
SENSOR_WINDOW.description_2a_s: When changes will be made on the window
SENSOR_WINDOW.description_2a_e: will be switched on or off (toggle function).
SENSOR_WINDOW.description_2b_e: switches into the other status respectively.

SHUTTER_CONTACT.description_0a_e: will be switched on for the selected time.
SHUTTER_CONTACT.description_1a_e: will be switched on for the selected time.
SHUTTER_CONTACT.description_2a_s: When changes will be made on the contact
SHUTTER_CONTACT.description_2a_e: will be switched on or off (toggle function).
SHUTTER_CONTACT.description_2b_e: switches into the other status respectively.

SMOKE_DETECTOR_TEAM.description_1_e: will be switched on for the selected time. If the alarm will be confirmed by the triggering device or a smoke detector of the same group it will be turned off.
SMOKE_DETECTOR_TEAM.subset_2: smoke detector of the same group

SWITCH_INTERFACE.description_1_e: changes to the other status for the selected time.
SWITCH_INTERFACE.description_2_e: will be switched on for the set time.
SWITCH_INTERFACE.description_3_s: <span class="translated">When the switch contact is activated

TILT_SENSOR.description_0a_e: will be switched on for the selected time.
TILT_SENSOR.description_1a_s: When the garage door is closed
TILT_SENSOR.description_1a_e: will be switched on for the selected time.
TILT_SENSOR.description_2a_s: <span class="translated">If the selected change signal is recognized

VIRTUAL_KEY.description_1_s: <span class="translated">With a long or short button press
VIRTUAL_KEY.description_1_e: will be switched on for the set time.
VIRTUAL_KEY.description_2_s: <span class="translated">With a long or short button press
VIRTUAL_KEY.description_2_e: will be switched on or off (toggle function).
VIRTUAL_KEY.description_3_s: <span class="translated">With a long or short button press

WATERDETECTIONSENSOR.description_1_e: will be switched on for the set time according to the selected direction.
WATERDETECTIONSENSOR.description_2_e: will be switched on for the set time according to the selected change signal.
WATERDETECTIONSENSOR.subset_3: switch on in case of absolute dry conditions
WATERDETECTIONSENSOR.subset_4: switch on in case of humidity
WATERDETECTIONSENSOR.subset_5: switch on at water level of at least 1.5 mm
WATERDETECTIONSENSOR.subset_6: switch on in case of humidity or water level of at least 1.5 mm
WATERDETECTIONSENSOR.subset_8: switch off in case of absolute dry conditions
WATERDETECTIONSENSOR.subset_9: switch off in case of humidity
WATERDETECTIONSENSOR.subset_10: switch off at water level of at least 1.5 mm
WATERDETECTIONSENSOR.subset_11: switch off in case of humidity or water level of at least 1.5 mm
WATERDETECTIONSENSOR.watery: only at water level of at least 1.5 mm

WEATHER.description_1_s: <span class="translated">When the selected wind velocity will be reached
WEATHER.description_1_e: will be switched on for the defined time.
